dmca.title: DMCA NOTICE TO INFRINGER theskinnywebsite
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Flynet Pictures [mailto:photos@flynetpictures.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 17, 2007 4:15 PM
To: abuse@theskinnywebsite.com; abuse; girl@theskinnywebsite.com;
Copyright
Subject: DMCA NOTICE TO INFRINGER theskinnywebsite

DMCA NOTICE TO AUTHORIZED AGENT (LISTED IN A DIRECTORY MAINTAINED BY
U.S. COPYRIGHT OFFICE) AND INFRINGER

Please be advised that Flynet Pictures, the owner of the exclusive
rights in and to the Photograph(s) entitled, "out and about lindsay
lohan looking wasted " This copyrighted material is currently being
infringed at the following URLs and/or the infringing activity is being
found at the following URLs:

http://theskinnywebsite.com/site/2006/11/28/out-and-about-lindsay-
lohan-looking-wasted/
    http://theskinnywebsite.com/site/photos/112806/
Lindsay_Lohan_@_Malibu_01.jpg
    http://theskinnywebsite.com/site/photos/112806/
Lindsay_Lohan_@_Malibu_05.jpg
    http://theskinnywebsite.com/site/photos/112806/
Lindsay_Lohan_@_Malibu_15.jpg
    http://theskinnywebsite.com/site/photos/112806/
Lindsay_Lohan_@_Malibu_18.jpg

and its related pages. On behalf of Flynet Pictures, I request that the
foregoing material and/or activity be removed or access to it disabled.


You may contact me as follows:
NAME:            Jason Kirk
ADDRESS:     1320 N Sycamore Ave
                       Hollywood, CA 90028
TEL:               323 461 7564
FAX :              323-461-7564
E-MAIL:           Jason@flynetpictures.com

On behalf of Flynet Pictures, as the owner of the exclusive right of the
copyrighted material at issue in this notice, I hereby state that I have
a good faith belief that the use of the material complained of is not
authorized by the copyright owner, his agent, or the law. I hereby
state, under penalty of perjury under the laws of the State of CA and
the United States, that the information herein is accurate




=======================================================
This email and its contents are confidential. If you are not the
intended recipient, please do not disclose or use the information within
this email or its attachments. If you have received this email in error,
please delete it immediately. Thank you, Flynet Pictures.
=======================================================
